documents: Athletic Works Speed Jump Rope Get a nice, intense workout in the comfort of your own home with this Athletic Works 9' Speed Jump Rope. It features an ergonomic slim handle design for balance and speed. The frictionless smooth rotation of this speed skipping rope ensures faster spins so that you can burn more fat. For incredible cardio workouts, this item is the right choice. It is small and lightweight enough for you to take with you to the park, beach, while on vacation and more. This Athletic Works jump rope helps increase your agility, coordination, and endurance, while maintaining good health. It is ideal for boxers, MMA fighters and other types of athletes and weekend warriors. For the money, five stars. Not to be confused with something that might cost you 100 bucks. But it is adjustable, provided you know what length you are comfortable with. Once you cut it, you cannot redo it. So, measure twice and cut once (or go in increments). Pull the excess thru from the handle end with pliers, and use scissors or a wire cutter. Vinyl rope will last long. Light-weight, good for cardio. Only bought this recently, so I don't know how well the entire construction of the handle and rope will last. But for under 7 bucks, it's a great investment in fitness gear. It is missing a handle. So it is totally useless

Stamina Ab Wheel Get the sculpted core and the toned upper body you've always wanted with Stamina Ab Wheel. It targets your arms, shoulders, back and abdomen all at once with one simple move. It's a smart alternative to crunches and sit-ups to tighten your body and strengthen your muscles, without having to leave your home. This ab roller features dual traction control wheels for increased stability and has soft, foam-grip handles that mold to your hands. It's easy to use for beginners and professionals. wanted to try something new. heads up though, if you aren't experienced in working out and with strong abdominal muscles, then this probably isn't for you. after putting it together, there are too much free space between the handles so the wheel wobbles a lot.  i had to put a spacer in between the wheels to use it.   should get it from the store so you can inspect it first.

The Step Original Aerobic Platform, Health Club Size, Four Original Risers, and Streaming Videos Achieve total-body fitness with The Step Original Aerobic Platform, Health Club Size, the same step used in fitness clubs across the country. This set includes a teal nonslip platform with premium cushion top, four original purple risers, and instructional streaming videos to create the foundation of any workout program. The Original Health Club Size platform features a wide 40? L x 14? W x 4? H stepping surface with a nonslip top for added safety and a comfort cushion (non-latex) top that is easy on the hands, feet, and back. Burn more calories the higher you step with 4in. to 6in to 8in platform height options using the 16in L x 16in W x 2in H risers. These sturdy risers can be used on any type of indoor flooring from carpet to concrete to hardwood without leaving behind scratches. The Step is a great home-fitness tool for beginners to experts and is customizable for a variety of aerobic and strength exercises. This set is crafted from durable, recyclable high-density polyethylene that supports up to 300 pounds (or up to 500 lbs with risers). This product is backed by a 90-day manufacturer's warranty period. This is a gym quality step with four risers.  Very solid and substantial and does not move around during step aerobics or body pump classes online.  Definitely recommend this.  It's worth paying a little more to have the quality and stability. I love my step it is strong and does not slide when I step on it. I love it

Tone Fitness Yoga Kit The Tone Fitness Yoga Kit offers all you need to get started in Yoga or expand your current routine. The yoga mat provides a comfortable, slip-resistant surface that is ideal for yoga, Pilates, floor stretching, abdominal exercises and pushups. This lightweight and durable yoga mat is suitable for home, travel or studio use. The added Yoga Block and Strap are a great way for beginners to get a little assistance in getting a great stretch without overdoing it and itermediate/advanced yogi are able to use them for a more advanced stretches and longer holds. After completing your routine, simply roll up and store everything in the included carry bag until next time! For the price this is an excellent beginning yoga equipment.  Yes, I could wish the yoga mat was thicker but I am just starting yoga so this is a good start.  Thank you. It comes with the carry case n mat n strap n block but the block doesnt fit in the carry case :( :(

Gaiam Zafu Meditation Cushion The Gaiam Zafu Meditation Cushion - Purple is designed to improve your position during meditation by stacking your spine while relieving pressure from your knees, ankles, and back. Filled with buckwheat hulls that gently conform to your body's shape and a removable microfiber cotton cover with an easy-to-carry handle. The internal fill bag also has a zipper so you can add or remove filling. Use with or without our coordinating Gaiam Zabuton Meditation Cushion.

Exactly what I wanted! Perfect for meditation, or just sitting on the floor. Helps keep my spine and pelvis aligned, and I love the color! I've had it for about a month, and it's been serving me well.

Okay this Gaiam Zafu Meditation cushion is by far the most comfortable cushion I have ever experienced. so supportive to the back and hips. Allowing for the most comfort during a good meditation session. I'm beyond happy with this purchase. Good price . Great quality! Very descent on delivery time.

Athletic Works 65cm Exercise Yoga Ball Whether you're training at home or in the gym, the Athletic Works 65cm Exercise Yoga Ball line will make the ideal workout partner to help you stay in shape. It's ideal for training, toning and strengthening your core muscles. This Athletic Works exercise ball will help to develop your overall balance, flexibility and coordination and help you on the road to a fit and healthy you. The collection is made from a high-quality slip-resistant material, which is gentle on the skin while you're using it. The anti-burst yoga ball targets the abs and lower back as well as tightens your core which can help improve your posture and alleviate back pain. It's also ideal for upper body exercises to strengthen the arms, chest and shoulders. This Athletic Works 65cm Exercise Yoga Ball is just the right piece of equipment for low-impact workouts for any fitness level. It's made of durable material and includes an air pump and exercise guide to help get you started. Available in other sizes. Great ball! Has lasted us about three years and we haven't had to refill any air. Its a little lower now than it was initally but it serves its purpose. We use it to sit on inbetween reps and it has survived my barbarian 300lb husband for the three years that we've had it. This was a god send when I was pregnant and i want one for work now. This is terrible. I bought this one and half month ago.. My 10 year old was doing his routine exercise and guess what!! the ball bursted. It could not even survive 80 lb load? We have used so many balls so far but never saw or heard one bursting. They claim it's made out of so called 'anti-burst material'. Total lie. 
Do not buy this..

Tone Fitness 5mm 24" x 68" Yoga Mat, Multiple Colors Experience a non-slip surface that allows you to focus on your poses with the Tone Fitness 24" x 68" Yoga Mat. The extra padding supports your body as you stand and stretch out. It is made without phthalates and weighs just over 2 pounds for lightweight carrying on your way to class. This 5mm thick yoga mat makes it easy to practice your poses anywhere, even outside in the fresh air. The top is decorated with a beautiful graphic image. It is available in two bright colors. Pair it with accessories from Tone Fitness, such as stability balls, neoprene dumbbell sets, walking dumbbells, walking weights, wrist weights, weighted vests, weight gloves and more (available separately).   Very well made. Looks great and works great for my daily yoga. When the mat is unrolled, it has an awful odor. It made me feel sick when doing floor exercises when my head was on it!  I took it out of my car and 24 hrs later, my car still wreaks of that atrocious smell! I am thinking of returning it.

CAP Yoga Reversible Yoga Mat (5mm) with Carry Strap, Dahlia/Ginkgo Increase the comfort and tranquility of your floor exercises with the CAP Yoga Mat. Beautiful, practical and comfortable, it provides 5mm of soft, textured surface that is well suited for Pilates and floor stretching exercises. This lightweight and durable mat is suitable for home, gym or studio use and is easy to transport using the included carry strap. After completing your routine, simply roll up and store until next time. Choose a Dahlia print on mustard backdrop or the reverse side Ginkgo print on London stone backdrop to match your mood. Love the design and bright color. Thick enough to workout. I really like it and I am pleased with my order. The mat is lightweight and easy to handle, but it started to break down the first time I used it. Little bits and pieces break off the surface whenever I exercise using the mat.

Spikeball 3 Ball Set. Includes playing net, 3 balls, drawstring bag and rule book

Easy to set up and fun to play...kids loved it!! Net was torn same price as on tube company website ordered it direct

Franklin Sports Total Outdoor Fun 5 Combo Game Enjoy time outside with this Fun 5 Combo set from Franklin Sports. Try your hand at badminton, volleyball, horseshoes, flip toss and flying disc. The set is complete with an adjustable net and all the needed accessories. Bring it along to your next backyard party, BBQ or the beach.  Net was easy to put up, everything looks nice. I like the green color. The volleyball seems a little small. But thats okay, I have smaller children.  The birdies broke very easily tho.  But all and all a VERY good price for the whole set. Disappointed. While I didn't expect it to be the best quality I did expect it to last more than one time. It was missing a piece for the net. One racket is already broken, and the things to catch the ball was pretty bent out of shape. Would return but it's not worth the hassle. Wish I had spent $20-$30 more and gotten something better.

Skywalker Trampolines 36-Inch Square Language Learning Mini Bouncer Keep the kids active with the Skywalker Trampolines 36-Inch Square Language Learning Mini Bouncer. This bouncy, kids trampoline will help your little ones develop gross motor skills while promoting imaginative play. With each jump, your kids will get acquainted with counting to ten in English, Spanish, French and Chinese. It features a sturdy frame and interlocking handlebars for added stability and safety with a simplified assembly process. This bouncer was designed with muted tones that the kids will love, but so will you! This 36-Inch bouncer includes 32 stretch bands are used in place of springs to protect the joints of young, growing kids. A padded handle stabilizes the bouncer as kids play, and a soft, padded cover protects your little ones as they climb on and off the trampoline. The Skywalker Trampolines 36-Inch Square Language Learning Mini Bouncer is a perfect starter trampoline for toddlers and kids! My grandson loves it. At first it was intimidating when I took it out of box, but actually assembly was easy. The ONLY issue I had is the sound part that goes over the hand rail. I could NOT get it to close completely together. The screws were just to small. I finally just wrapped it with electrical tape. The way the did that could have been done better. Thats the reason it does t have 5 full stars. WELLL.... MY 1  1/2 YEAR OLD TWINS DID LOVE AND SO ENJOYED JUMPING ON.... HOWEVER WE HAD A WHOLE ALMOST 6 MONTHS TO THE DAY BEFORE ONE OF THE SIDES OF THE BAR CAME OFF AT THE LOCATION WHERE ITS WELDED ONTO THE FRAME SO NOW WITH A DANGLING BAR THAT DOES NOTHING TO HELP THEM WITH STABILITY WHILE JUMPING ITS JUST KIND OF SITTING IN MY LIVING ROOM!!!!  I DO NOT FEEL WE GOT OUR MONEY WORTH!!! MY TWINS ARE 23 AND 27LBS, I EXPECTED TO LAST LONGER THAN THIS!!!!

Bounce Pro 7-Foot My First Trampoline Hexagon (Ages 3-10) for Kids, Blue/Green Keep little ones entertained and active in the backyard with the Bounce Pro My First Trampoline in blue and green. Designed with fun, quality and safety in mind, it features a three-arch netted safety enclosure that keeps children contained as they play while providing parents with unrestricted visibility. This kid's trampoline also includes a padded spring cover and a UV-resistant jump mat sewn together to prevent any unwanted contact with the springs. Blow-molded plastic U-legs maintain balance and stability while foam padding on the frame poles provides an additional layer of safety. The galvanized steel frame stands up to the elements and resists rust. Kids can enter and exit easily through the zippered opening. The Bounce Pro 7' My First trampoline is easy to assemble, offering convenience and saving time. Have had this trampoline for several months now. First trampoline, instructions were good, easy enough to put together, and no issues. Like that they sell replacement parts on they're website if ever needed. As an extra, I bought a bunch of balls and turn it into a ball pit every once in a while while. I was excited for my daughter who's trying to learn to jump. I finally found someone to keep her while i put it together to only find there is a missing pole. Now i have to find someone to keep her again so i can package this heavy box up and return it.

EastPoint Sports Stars and Stripes Cornhole, Outdoor Bean Bag Toss Set Bean Bag Toss, Cornhole, Hillbilly Horseshoes or Tailgate Toss. No matter what it is called, everyone enjoys a little backyard rivalry to spice up a company picnic, family reunion or barbeque. EastPoint Sports Stars and Strips Cornhole Game Set has everything needed to play; bean bags and two boards with a convenient carry handle and built in storage. Add a little bonding through friendly competition to any event with the boldly colored, patriotic design of stars and stripes in striking red, white and blue. Slick sliding surface on each board allows each of the 8 included bags to glide smoothly into the holes for tons of high-scoring fun. Reinforced edges and corners make sure this set can handle a few bumps and bruises. When the fun is over, boards attach together and bean bags store neatly in-between for storage or transport. Simply grab Easy Lift attached handles and take the party on the road. Store indoors; the product is not waterproof. I was so excited to receive the game for my family, but was disappointed when it arrived with two of the caps broken.  I called the company and asked if they could mail new caps and they did.  I received the caps in a timely manner, replaced them and the game board is as good as new.  Very grateful they were willing to do this for me so I didn't have to return the game. I bought these for our camping trips. We got caught in the rain once and they are pretty much ruined.  They are for outside use so they should be sealed.  I'm very disappointed. For the price I expect more than trash. I'm hoping they dry out even so they are not gonna look the same and very well might fall apart once a bag hits it.

Franklin Sports Total Outdoor Fun 5 Combo Game Enjoy time outside with this Fun 5 Combo set from Franklin Sports. Try your hand at badminton, volleyball, horseshoes, flip toss and flying disc. The set is complete with an adjustable net and all the needed accessories. Bring it along to your next backyard party, BBQ or the beach.  Net was easy to put up, everything looks nice. I like the green color. The volleyball seems a little small. But thats okay, I have smaller children.  The birdies broke very easily tho.  But all and all a VERY good price for the whole set. Disappointed. While I didn't expect it to be the best quality I did expect it to last more than one time. It was missing a piece for the net. One racket is already broken, and the things to catch the ball was pretty bent out of shape. Would return but it's not worth the hassle. Wish I had spent $20-$30 more and gotten something better.

With each jump, your kids will get acquainted with counting to ten in English, Spanish, French and Chinese. It features a sturdy frame and interlocking handlebars for added stability and safety with a simplified assembly process. This bouncer was designed with muted tones that the kids will love, but so will you! This 36-Inch bouncer includes 32 stretch bands are used in place of springs to protect the joints of young, growing kids. A padded handle stabilizes the bouncer as kids play, and a soft, padded cover protects your little ones as they climb on and off the trampoline. The Skywalker Trampolines 36-Inch Square Language Learning Mini Bouncer is a perfect starter trampoline for toddlers and kids! My grandson loves it. At first it was intimidating when I took it out of box, but actually assembly was easy. The ONLY issue I had is the sound part that goes over the hand rail. I could NOT get it to close completely together. The screws were just to small. I finally just wrapped it with electrical tape. The way the did that could have been done better. Thats the reason it does t have 5 full stars. WELLL.... MY 1  1/2 YEAR OLD TWINS DID LOVE AND SO ENJOYED JUMPING ON.... HOWEVER WE HAD A WHOLE ALMOST 6 MONTHS TO THE DAY BEFORE ONE OF THE SIDES OF THE BAR CAME OFF AT THE LOCATION WHERE ITS WELDED ONTO THE FRAME SO NOW WITH A DANGLING BAR THAT DOES NOTHING TO HELP THEM WITH STABILITY WHILE JUMPING ITS JUST KIND OF SITTING IN MY LIVING ROOM!!!!  I DO NOT FEEL WE GOT OUR MONEY WORTH!!! MY TWINS ARE 23 AND 27LBS, I EXPECTED TO LAST LONGER THAN THIS!!!!

RampShot Game Set- "Cornhole on Steroids," Great for Families, Yard, Beach, Tailgate, Camping - Includes 2 Ramps, 4 Balls, 2 Stickers, 2 Nets, and Instructions Most outdoor games involve one or two players at a time, RampShot involves 3 out of 4 players on every turn. This highly interactive game keeps all players engaged in a fun, competitive spirit. RampShot helps develop motor skills, hand-eye coordination, teamwork and good old fashion fun for 4 players. RampShot can be played in just about any social gathering. Bring it with you to backyard hangouts, beach parties, tailgating events, or camping retreats.RampShot is a four player outdoor game that utilizes two high quality plastic ramps and four racquetball style balls. Teammates stand on opposite sides of the playing area and work together to score points by tossing and/or catching the balls. Three points for a shot directly in the net. One point if your teammate catches the ball on a fly after bouncing off of the ramp. If the shooter's toss comes up short and hits the front of the ramp, the ball will bounce back in the shooter's direction. The opposing team member can now come in and catch the ball to gain an extra shot for their team. The first team to 15 wins! 

We LOVE this game! My family purchased rampshot for a camping trip and we instantly fell in love. We now bring it with us every time we go to the beach. Great for the entire family, highly recommend.

I just played RampShot for the first time and it was so much fun! The instructions were very simple and clear, which made learning the game very easy. The game itself was so much fun, something my friends and I played for hours. I can see this game being a staple for my family at the beach or family gatherings. I'd recommend everybody to get this game! I am writing this review as a Walmart employee.

Zume Games Portable Badminton Set with Freestanding Base Sets Up on Any Surface in Seconds. No Tools or Stakes Required Ultra portable and nearly instant, the Zume Games Badminton Set is up in seconds. Its freestanding base design sets up on any surface and doesn't require tools or stakes. Plus, the carrying case makes it easy to take with you anywhere. This set also includes 2 red rackets, 2 green rackets, and 2 shuttlecocks. Pro:  Very innovative!  Great for setting up anywhere.  Moves with ease and our family had a great time using it.
Pro:  Extremely fast delivery.  
Pro:  'Designed' to be a self-contained storage unit.
Pro:  Everyone agreed that the rackets were exceptional!   
Pro:  The net is well made and the shuttle cocks arrived perfectly formed!
Con:  The orange arms do not align themselves with the holes within the bore inside the box (see pics) and we were lucky to get one to click into place.  Once strenuously forced to fit the distorted position of the holes - the orange arms cannot be removed ever again.  . . .and boy we tried!  The rest of the arms deployed easily.
Con:  As the orange arms are fully extended so that the net can be set in place; the inner most (largest diameter telescoping) arm starts to split where the subsequent arm locks into place.  CAUTION:  Use two people to hold the extended arms suspended while placing the net in place.  We found that a small hose clamp restored the structural strength of the damaged arm (see pics).
Conclusion:  The wonderfully innovated deployment and storage of these orange net arms should be its greatest hallmark, unfortunately; it is the only shortcoming of the system as its because the quality of these arms could NOT be made any cheaper. 
    I recommend this item overall, with the caveat of buyer beware. not big enough always falling while wind

Croquet Set Fun Vintage Lawn Recreation Game by Hey! Play! Get out and enjoy the beautiful weather with this Complete Croquet Set with Carrying Case by Trademark Games. This is a complete kit that has enough equipment for six people to play. This croquet game set comes with a carrying case that makes it easier for you to transport it from place to place. It provides you with a fun way to enjoy the outdoors while spending quality time with your family and friends. The wooden croquet set comes with six 3" croquet balls, two solid wooden stakes and coated weather-protected wire rickets. It also has six 26" solid wood mallets with 1-8/9" diameter cushion-capped heads. This fun game will make a suitable addition to your next barbecue, picnic, party or reunion. It will help pass the time while you enjoy laughs and the summer weather. When you are done playing with it you can easily store the set in your garage or in a closet.All of the parts are designed for durability. You will be able to enjoy fun times for years to come. This Complete Croquet Set with Carrying Case by Trademark Games is a must for someone that wants to entertain guests in the backyard.  I was very pleased with the set I purchased. Be aware, at first glance the picture looks like there is a stand. There is not. I also remember as a kid how cool the wooden balls were. However I am now 70 so that was a long time ago. I realize the cost of using wooden balls and having a great stand is why some of the sets cost so much more than what I paid. I would prefer to have been able to afford a more expensive set that had a stand, and wooden balls. However, I was very pleased with the set I purchased. It will give us many hours of pleasure. I suspect it will not last as many years as the ones with wooden balls would, but the quality is great for the price. bought this as a gift.  Received two yellow balls and no purple ball.  Kind of hard to play 6 people when two of you have the same color ball.  I also wish that the mallets would fit inside the bag without having to be taken apart each time.

Skywalker Trampolines 8' Trampoline, with Safety Enclosure, Blue The Skywalker 8' Trampoline with Safety Enclosure is designed to give both large and small yards a fun and safe jumping arena. It features a patented no-gap enclosure system that interlocks the jump mat and the enclosure net at each of the 56 springs, eliminating potentially dangerous gaps. The durable round trampoline framework is made of weather- and rust-resistant galvanized steel, providing extra protection for years to come. It includes T-socket reinforcements to strengthen and increase the frame stability. This blue trampoline offers year-round outdoor excitement that even smaller jumpers will enjoy. The enclosure net features a dual zipper and latch clip closure to help keep little ones safely contained inside. The incorporation of the extra-thick spring pad and UV-protected jump mat makes the Skywalker 8' Trampoline with Safety Enclosure a fun pad for the whole family. We set this up in our basement with average ceilings. Our 5 year old is well away from the ceiling when bouncing.. it does take up most of the room we have it in. Assemble took some man muscle with the springs.
Trampoline is built like its full-sized, just scaled down to 8 ft. Sturdy construction.
ALERT: Positioning of the trampoline on the frame is specific because of the enclosure. We had to tear down and redo the trampoline because the enclosure attaches at specific points on the support arms. We blamed it on the instructions but it was late and common sense was low. The padding came with a rip!  Kid hasn't even jumped on it. Pretty annoying that I'm going to have to sew it before rain gets inside. Or duct tape it. Imagine duct tape on a brand me trampoline! Also, the instructions say you're allowed to take a snack break - I took two.

Skywalker Trampolines 10' Trampoline, with Enclosure and Wind Stakes, Blue Get jumping with a Skywalker Trampolines 10-Foot Trampoline with Enclosure and Windstakes. It features a stylish yet stable design that will help keep little ones secure while they bounce. This round trampoline has a patented no-gap enclosure system in which the jump mat and enclosure net interlocks at each spring, eliminating dangerous gaps. It is just the right size for smaller children as it measures only 31 inches off the ground. The blue trampoline features four, 12.5 inches long wind stakes that are made of weather-resistant galvanized steel and will help to stabilize the unit even during strong winds and storms. The heavy-duty, UV-resistant jump mat combined with the durable, galvanized steel framework provides an unforgettable experience that will stand the test of time. Skywalker Trampolines 10-Foot Trampoline with Enclosure and Windstakes is a fun way to stay active and makes a nice addition to a backyard or outdoor play area. I bought this Trampoline for myself and I am 6ft and 168 pounds. I use it for bouncing, which keeps my body limber. I recommend this trampoline, since its inexpensive and not too big. I lay on it and still have a lot of head room, as well as foot space. I cover the trampoline with a 12' tarp when I am not using it, since it is sitting out in the hot sun all day! Buying through Walmart is the way to go, since you know if the trampoline is not for you, you can return it! I believe the company supports their product and believes in their quality! Enough said. The net was much smaller then the trampoline. Two of the holes were bent had to take them to a machine shop to try and fix them so I could finish assembling it.

Airzone 38-Inch Fitness Trampoline, Blue This Airzone 38" Fitness Trampoline uses a band suspension system, as opposed to the metal springs that are commonly used with other brands. It provides for a more controlled and much quieter rebound, allowing for quiet use. Ideal for use indoors or outdoors when warm weather comes, it's a fantastic way for all to exercise while having fun. This fitness trampoline does not have any sharp spring ends, making it safer and more reliable. When using it indoors, be sure it is positioned in a room with a high ceiling to maximize head clearance. The unit is easy to set up and fold down quickly. This blue trampoline features compact dimensions, so you can store it away when not in use. It's small enough to slide under beds or fit in a closet, allowing for easier organization in small spaces. Love it. Its perfect, I'm old and I like that it is not hard in middle. Gives me a nice bounce when I jog on it. The size is great. It takes 3 people to put  together.  It is very very easy,  but you need the strength to do it. Definitely not a one person job. Item was in a damaged condition. You could even see the tools through the plastic were in a damaged condition. The box it came in was dirty and with wholes and markings. People these days have become too comfortable with just throwing anything together in any condition and expecting you to pay for it. I would even want it if it was given to me for free.

Stamina 36-Inch Trampoline Circuit Trainer with monitor Get your heart rate up and muscles working hard with the Stamina Circuit Trainer Trampoline. Rebound in standard position or incline your trampoline for weighted ball rebound throws. This fun, effective cardio workout makes losing weight a totally new experience. Measure your calories burned, time and total number of jumps with the included monitor. Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Use in flat or inclined position Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs I think the construction, assembly, quality and bouncy fun for our family is great. 

The cover that goes over the "springs" isn't as necessary since they aren't metal and not much space between them. However it does serve a function. Small feet could still fall/slip between them if the cover isn't there. The cover that comes with it is not the best. It doesn't stay on and easily slips off. We zip-tied it in several places. It still tried to come of where we didn't zip it. 

It's entirely possible we installed the cover incorrectly. There were not specific instructions on how to install this part. I was so excited for this little trampoline.  It is awesome but it seems like I received some incorrect parts, which render it to wobble when you bounce-which is pretty scary.

The leg pieces have two different types but not enough of either for all of the legs to have the same cover.  Which leaves them at different elevations.

Airzone 48-Inch Fitness Trampoline, Blue This Airzone 48" Fitness Trampoline uses a band suspension system, as opposed to the metal springs that are commonly used with other brands. It provides for a more controlled and much quieter rebound, allowing for quiet use. Ideal for use indoors or outdoors when warm weather comes, it's a fantastic way for all to exercise while having fun. This fitness trampoline does not have any sharp spring ends, making it safer and more reliable. When using it indoors, be sure it is positioned in a room with a high ceiling to maximize head clearance. The unit is easy to set up and fold down quickly. This blue trampoline features compact dimensions, so you can store it away when not in use. It's small enough to slide under beds or fit in a closet, allowing for easier organization in small spaces.The Airzone 48" Trampoline cover has a thick, sewn-in layer of padding on the inside lining for added safety.   I got this trampoline for my kids to use while in our condo outside during quarantine because they were getting a little restless. They absolutely love the trampoline itsI got this trampoline for my kids to use while in our condo outside during quarantine because they were getting a little restless. They absolutely love the trampoline itself. Ever, the box it came in was falling apart with a big hole in it. And this trampoline does not have quails it is more rubber band like straps. My husband and I really struggled to put this together. The pictures are not super clear on the instruction manual. So overall yes great trampoline however if I was buying a trampoline again I would get a trampoline with quails Not great for outside, legs dig into the ground and then you lose the caps. Then it digs into the ground way easier as the cap at least covered the sharp edges of the metal pipe.

It's also now rotted so outside I got about 6 months of use and spent $30 on new "feet" to keep it from digging into the ground.

I paid $30 for the item and now it's over twice the price...

ALERT: Positioning of the trampoline on the frame is specific because of the enclosure. We had to tear down and redo the trampoline because the enclosure attaches at specific points on the support arms. We blamed it on the instructions but it was late and common sense was low. The padding came with a rip!  Kid hasn't even jumped on it. Pretty annoying that I'm going to have to sew it before rain gets inside. Or duct tape it. Imagine duct tape on a brand me trampoline! Also, the instructions say you're allowed to take a snack break - I took two.

Skywalker Trampolines 10' Trampoline, with Enclosure and Wind Stakes, Blue Get jumping with a Skywalker Trampolines 10-Foot Trampoline with Enclosure and Windstakes. It features a stylish yet stable design that will help keep little ones secure while they bounce. This round trampoline has a patented no-gap enclosure system in which the jump mat and enclosure net interlocks at each spring, eliminating dangerous gaps. It is just the right size for smaller children as it measures only 31 inches off the ground. The blue trampoline features four, 12.5 inches long wind stakes that are made of weather-resistant galvanized steel and will help to stabilize the unit even during strong winds and storms. The heavy-duty, UV-resistant jump mat combined with the durable, galvanized steel framework provides an unforgettable experience that will stand the test of time. Skywalker Trampolines 10-Foot Trampoline with Enclosure and Windstakes is a fun way to stay active and makes a nice addition to a backyard or outdoor play area. I bought this Trampoline for myself and I am 6ft and 168 pounds. I use it for bouncing, which keeps my body limber. I recommend this trampoline, since its inexpensive and not too big. I lay on it and still have a lot of head room, as well as foot space. I cover the trampoline with a 12' tarp when I am not using it, since it is sitting out in the hot sun all day! Buying through Walmart is the way to go, since you know if the trampoline is not for you, you can return it! I believe the company supports their product and believes in their quality! Enough said. The net was much smaller then the trampoline. Two of the holes were bent had to take them to a machine shop to try and fix them so I could finish assembling it.

Little Tikes Easy Store 3-Foot Trampoline, with Hand Rail, Blue/Red Trampolines from Little Tikes are so much fun, your kids will never want to stop jumping! This Little Tikes 3-foot kid's trampoline is the perfect size to provide hours of bouncing fun! Little Tikes knows it is important for kids to stay active, and the 3-foot trampoline is easy to move so kids can bounce wherever they like any time they like! Now this best-selling trampoline has folding capabilities for easy storage, too! Also, this trampoline will make a fun gift for a special occasion. It is wonderful for low-impact exercise in a playroom or backyard. This product is ideal for offering lots of enjoyment and activity for your little ones. You are sure to be pleased with the Little Tikes 3' Trampoline, which is both convenient and functional.   Wow! My 3-year-old granddaughter got this for her birthday recently and she is over-the-moon happy! It's practically  the first thing she runs to upon getting up in the morning. 

She talks really well for her age and when asked "What did you do on your birthday?" Excitedly responds, "Jumped on my Trampoline!" 

The toy was more simple to assemble than I expected, but I do suggest you find a quiet, spacious area where you can spread out all the pieces and keep the tiny pieces close. 

We hope you enjoy this Trampoline as much as we do!!! Not super sturdy. Not easy to assemble as the pieces didn't fit right. Paint chipped a gazillion times and came with many dents but child does enjoy it. Not sure if I'd recommend... I'm on the fence.

Stamina 36-Inch Trampoline Circuit Trainer with monitor Get your heart rate up and muscles working hard with the Stamina Circuit Trainer Trampoline. Rebound in standard position or incline your trampoline for weighted ball rebound throws. This fun, effective cardio workout makes losing weight a totally new experience. Measure your calories burned, time and total number of jumps with the included monitor. Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Use in flat or inclined position Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs Includes monitor for tracking calories burned, time and jump count Standard flat position for muscle toning Incline position for additional exercises Steel frame Adjustable legs I think the construction, assembly, quality and bouncy fun for our family is great. 

The cover that goes over the "springs" isn't as necessary since they aren't metal and not much space between them. However it does serve a function. Small feet could still fall/slip between them if the cover isn't there. The cover that comes with it is not the best. It doesn't stay on and easily slips off. We zip-tied it in several places. It still tried to come of where we didn't zip it. 

It's entirely possible we installed the cover incorrectly. There were not specific instructions on how to install this part. I was so excited for this little trampoline.  It is awesome but it seems like I received some incorrect parts, which render it to wobble when you bounce-which is pretty scary.

The leg pieces have two different types but not enough of either for all of the legs to have the same cover.  Which leaves them at different elevations.

Airzone 48-Inch Fitness Trampoline, Blue This Airzone 48" Fitness Trampoline uses a band suspension system, as opposed to the metal springs that are commonly used with other brands. It provides for a more controlled and much quieter rebound, allowing for quiet use. Ideal for use indoors or outdoors when warm weather comes, it's a fantastic way for all to exercise while having fun. This fitness trampoline does not have any sharp spring ends, making it safer and more reliable. When using it indoors, be sure it is positioned in a room with a high ceiling to maximize head clearance. The unit is easy to set up and fold down quickly. This blue trampoline features compact dimensions, so you can store it away when not in use. It's small enough to slide under beds or fit in a closet, allowing for easier organization in small spaces.The Airzone 48" Trampoline cover has a thick, sewn-in layer of padding on the inside lining for added safety.   I got this trampoline for my kids to use while in our condo outside during quarantine because they were getting a little restless. They absolutely love the trampoline itsI got this trampoline for my kids to use while in our condo outside during quarantine because they were getting a little restless. They absolutely love the trampoline itself. Ever, the box it came in was falling apart with a big hole in it. And this trampoline does not have quails it is more rubber band like straps. My husband and I really struggled to put this together. The pictures are not super clear on the instruction manual. So overall yes great trampoline however if I was buying a trampoline again I would get a trampoline with quails Not great for outside, legs dig into the ground and then you lose the caps. Then it digs into the ground way easier as the cap at least covered the sharp edges of the metal pipe.

It's also now rotted so outside I got about 6 months of use and spent $30 on new "feet" to keep it from digging into the ground.

I paid $30 for the item and now it's over twice the price...

Sew-Your-Own Reusable Face Mask Kit, Set of 4 w/ Assorted Fabrics Sew your own DIY Face Mask Kit! COntains supplies to create four Face Masks, with a pocket to insert a filter. Kit includes: 8 pre-cut cotton fabrics in assorted colors and patterns, filter material, and elastic for 4 masks. Also includes pattern/instructions and YouTube tutorial link. This face mask kit comes with eight squares of 100% cotton fabric, filter material, elastic and instructions. You definitely need to use an iron to make creases to achieve professional results. The instructions are well written but I watched the YouTube tutorial before I made mine. The video is very helpful. For my first mask, I followed the instructions exactly as I watched in the video. I was very happy with the end result. Now, you'll notice that one of my masks looks a little different than the other three. That's because after successfully making the first one, I didn't think I needed to refer to the instructions again. That was a mistake. When I turned the 2nd mask right side out, I realized I had made an error but I had already stitched around the edges twice so I didn't want to take it all apart. I believe the wonky mask will still work as is. I referred back to the instructions after that...lol. The 3rd and 4th masks turned out perfect. I used 7 inches of elastic for my ear bands. I have a small face. I'm also planning to use filter squares inside the mask. It's nice to have the option of two different sides of color for each mask. My kit came with fabrics that had feminine patterns and colors for three masks and one set of squares was a more masculine navy blue and a blue/white pattern on the other side. I sent my brother a picture of the blue mask, and he liked it so I'll share that mask with him. This was an easy, fun project. I made this item today by watching the video on "you tube". I'm not a seamstress but I do know my way around a sewing machine and pattern. The video was very easy to follow but the masks are tedious to do, the material is very thin and the supposed "filter" is ridiculous. 
 Once made this item did not fit me. I have small ears and the elastic kept pulling my ears forward and rolling off. I had my daughter try it also and the same thing happened to her. She did say (before the elastic rolled off her ears) they were comfortable and is large enough to cover your nose and under your chin but that is where the "good" ends with this product. With the flimsy material they call a "filter" I see minimal protection from any germs or viruses. 
 Once the filter was in place I spread the mask out to use it, but when I tried to close or flatten the mask back up the filter did not flatten with it. It bunched up inside the mask so you had to go inside with your fingers (through the open hole) and straighten it out for it to lie flat. 
 I'm not saying this item would not work for another person with larger ears but if you have smaller ears I don't see it working very well and if you have to reach inside the mask to flatten the filter then it really isn't working for you is it? 
 I can not in good conscience recommend this item as a barrier to germs and viruses. I would suggest you look elsewhere.

Sew-Your-Own Reusable Face Mask Kit, Set of 4 w/ Assorted Fabrics Sew your own DIY Face Mask Kit! COntains supplies to create four Face Masks, with a pocket to insert a filter. Kit includes: 8 pre-cut cotton fabrics in assorted colors and patterns, filter material, and elastic for 4 masks. Also includes pattern/instructions and YouTube tutorial link. This face mask kit comes with eight squares of 100% cotton fabric, filter material, elastic and instructions. You definitely need to use an iron to make creases to achieve professional results. The instructions are well written but I watched the YouTube tutorial before I made mine. The video is very helpful. For my first mask, I followed the instructions exactly as I watched in the video. I was very happy with the end result. Now, you'll notice that one of my masks looks a little different than the other three. That's because after successfully making the first one, I didn't think I needed to refer to the instructions again. That was a mistake. When I turned the 2nd mask right side out, I realized I had made an error but I had already stitched around the edges twice so I didn't want to take it all apart. I believe the wonky mask will still work as is. I referred back to the instructions after that...lol. The 3rd and 4th masks turned out perfect. I used 7 inches of elastic for my ear bands. I have a small face. I'm also planning to use filter squares inside the mask. It's nice to have the option of two different sides of color for each mask. My kit came with fabrics that had feminine patterns and colors for three masks and one set of squares was a more masculine navy blue and a blue/white pattern on the other side. I sent my brother a picture of the blue mask, and he liked it so I'll share that mask with him. This was an easy, fun project. I made this item today by watching the video on "you tube". I'm not a seamstress but I do know my way around a sewing machine and pattern. The video was very easy to follow but the masks are tedious to do, the material is very thin and the supposed "filter" is ridiculous. 
 Once made this item did not fit me. I have small ears and the elastic kept pulling my ears forward and rolling off. I had my daughter try it also and the same thing happened to her. She did say (before the elastic rolled off her ears) they were comfortable and is large enough to cover your nose and under your chin but that is where the "good" ends with this product. With the flimsy material they call a "filter" I see minimal protection from any germs or viruses. 
 Once the filter was in place I spread the mask out to use it, but when I tried to close or flatten the mask back up the filter did not flatten with it. It bunched up inside the mask so you had to go inside with your fingers (through the open hole) and straighten it out for it to lie flat. 
 I'm not saying this item would not work for another person with larger ears but if you have smaller ears I don't see it working very well and if you have to reach inside the mask to flatten the filter then it really isn't working for you is it? 
 I can not in good conscience recommend this item as a barrier to germs and viruses. I would suggest you look elsewhere.

Crayola Giant Box of Crayons, 120 Count This mega box of crayons for kids features 120 classic colors that generations have grown up with. From red, yellow, and blue to gold, copper, and silver, Crayola crayons are designed with children in mind. Double wrapped for durability, these are tools are meant to be used over and over. Little artists will love the smooth, vibrant lay down for expressing all of their creative ideas! Use the convenient storage case for carrying all of their favorite coloring supplies while on the go! Pair with a Crayola coloring book for a great gift for girls and boys. Safe and nontoxic, ideal for children ages 4 and up. I love the colors, even the new ones. 120 is plenty too choose from. I have always loved Crayola crayons. As a little girl I would get so excited about my new box of 8 crayons, then the 64 count, then the 96 count, now it is 120 count I am one happy adult. I have to say that, when I received them, I was pretty happy. Even if they come in two boxes of 48 and one of 24, all colors are different. I am not quite sure why other reviewers say some colors are the same, they even have different names! Only one white, only one black, silver, gold... Nice.
The problem came with the use. Five minutes of kids between 6 and 8 coloring and several had broken. I was controlling them and there was no misuse, they were coloring normally and several just broke between their fingers! Fingers that, by the way, were stained where they touched the crayon instead of the paper covering it. After 15 minutes of use, the crayons looked like they had been used for weeks, the material is too soft and weak. Price was great but this is not even dollar store quality, it is worse.

Cascade Platinum ActionPacs Dishwasher Detergent, Fresh, 62 ct

Cascade Platinum Actionpacs dishwasher detergent cleans burnt-on messes in just one wash, with no pre-wash needed. My SIL turned me on to Cascade Platinum a couple years ago. I am so impressed and will never stray my loyalty. Before I used this I would have to polish my silverware and try to ignore foggy glassware. It seemed the other d/w detergent would leave a film on everything. But not Cascade Platinum, my silverware is beautiful and shiny, LOVE IT. The product is great, no complaints there. DampRid Fresh Scent Drop-In Tab Moisture Absorber Starter Kit for Fresher, Cleaner Air DampRid Drop-In Moisture Absorbing Tab Starter Kit attracts and traps excess moisture that causes unpleasant, stale, musty odors. Without using electricity, DampRid crystals absorb excess moisture to create and maintain optimal humidity levels wherever moisture is a problem in the home or office. To use, simply insert an unwrapped tab into the top container. When the bottom container is full and the tab has dissolved, pour out the water and insert a refill tab (sold separately). Each tab lasts 60 days depending on temperature and humidity and will begin working as soon as it is unwrapped! DampRid is ideal for use in the basement, closet, bathroom, laundry room, or storage area – anywhere damp air is a problem. Not for use in moving vehicles. Keep out of reach of children. DampRid Fragrance Free 10.5 oz. Refillable Moisture Absorber Tubs - 2 Pack The DampRid 2 Pack Refillable Moisture Absorber Cups are your solution for continuous cleaner, fresher air. Works wonders as a closet deodorizer, freshener, or odor neutralizer wherever moisture in an issue. Use this multipack one at a time for long-lasting freshness or spread them out between the bathroom, laundry room, kitchen, home office, basement, garage, stored boat, or RV. DampRid Mega Refillable Moisture Absorber (5 lb.) for Large Damp Areas The DampRid 5 lb. Refillable Moisture Absorber is the fragrance free solution for a non-electric dehumidifier and musty odor eliminator and air freshener. This musty odor eliminator DampRid works by attracting and trapping excess moisture to maintain optimal humidity levels. Use this mega 5 lb. container for long-lasting fresher, cleaner air. To activate this convenient odor absorber, simply remove the lid, but do not remove safety cover. Cut the enclosed bag open, pour crystals into the top tray and replace lid. Requires only 2 refills per year depending on temperature and humidity. Keep out of reach of children. Read and follow all label directions. I have been using the smaller version of this product for a couple of years in my basement game room. To see this in a “mega” size is great. Having used a dehumidifier that you had to plug in and then empty every time you turned around, this product is a welcome change. It is so easy to use, plus no loud noises from a plug in dehumidifier! You just open and pour the crystal mixture into the top of the receptacle, put the lid back on and set it where you need it. The crystals absorb the moisture in the air and when the crystals harden and forms a liquid that drips to the bottom of the receptacle, you dump out into your toilet and flush away. After the crystals are all dissolved, you replace with new ones. It is septic safe and I like that I can't smell any mustiness. This should last at least 6 months depending on the dampness of your area. The DampRid did not have the tray to put the crystals in. The lid was not taped closed and it must have been lost in the warehouse.  I cannot even use it.

Seventh Generation Geranium Blossom & Vanilla Concentrated Liquid Laundry Detergent 40 oz Powerfully clean and wonderfully scented ? just the way Mother Nature intended. Seventh Generation Laundry Detergent Liquid Concentrated with Geranium Blossoms and Vanilla scent features a triple-enzyme formula that fights tough stains without the use of synthetic fragrances, dyes, or artificial brighteners. This laundry soap uses plant-derived enzyme stain removers like Protease and Amylase to tackle all of life?s messes. We like to keep it real when it comes to scents, too. Geranium Blossoms and Vanilla Laundry Detergent is gently scented with 100% essential oils and botanical extracts like bergamot, geranium, and vanilla. Our ultra-concentrated laundry soap uses less added water, allowing us to use a smaller bottle to deliver impressive cleaning power ? 53 loads in a 40 oz. container. Good things really do come in small packages. For more than 25 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating safe and effective plant-based products that work. Really well. As a leading green laundry detergent manufacturer, we are proud to make biodegradable detergents made with plant-based ingredients. You may also notice a cute Leaping Bunny seal on our products. That means we never test our products on animals and our products do not contain animal-based ingredients. We design our products to be safe for people, their homes, and the environment. Based in Vermont, Seventh Generation is proud to be a Certified B Corporation. B Corps are certified to be better for workers, better for communities, and better for the environment. By choosing Seventh Generation laundry products, you?re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations. HE Laundry Detergent Just started using this on a regular basis, and I am duly impressed. 4 loads today, duvet, sheets, towels and they all came out better, they came out perfect! The cardboard packing is what caught my eye, but now I'm hooked on the contents too! No more softener. What is the point of something eco friendly sold in plastic? Seventh Generation used to lead but now they are behind other brands in green packaging.

Gain Original Ecobox HE, 96 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 fl oz

Gain Eco-Box is the same liquid laundry detergent you know but in smarter package. Made with 30% less water, it gives you 30% more freshness per drop* and lifts away dirt and locks in an ahhhmazing scent to keep your laundry smelling great, even after two weeks.

I dont typically use Gain, but I was excited to check out this new eco-box. The detergent itself has a really strong fragrance. It isnt bad but may not be able to be used with my normal softener. The box was wonderful! It was easy to store, easy to use, and good for the environment! Overall pleased. This review was collected as part of a promotion, but the thoughts and the opinions are my own. have order this before twice. decided to order it again. this time half my order arrived and the box itself was a mess the plastic packaging was nasty with soap. When removing the plastic wrap the box itself was torn and looked as if it leaked.

Tide Purclean Eco-box HE, 72 Loads Plant-based Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 Fl oz

Tide purclean removes stains and odors just as well as original Tide without harmful chemicals. This is great for anyone with sensitive skin or allergies. It leaves my laundry smelling fresh and removes stains. It is low sudsing and rinses easily. It dispenses easily from the carton and has a handy storage place for the cap in the top of the box. I love that the packaging has less plastic and more environment friendly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The fragrance and packaging were great but my primary expectation from a laundry detergent is that it cleans my laundry. I was very disappointed with this product from a cleaning standpoint. I had to use an additive to get the same level of clean that I was used to from traditional Tide.

By choosing Seventh Generation laundry products, you?re joining us in nurturing the health of the next seven generations. HE Laundry Detergent Just started using this on a regular basis, and I am duly impressed. 4 loads today, duvet, sheets, towels and they all came out better, they came out perfect! The cardboard packing is what caught my eye, but now I'm hooked on the contents too! No more softener. What is the point of something eco friendly sold in plastic? Seventh Generation used to lead but now they are behind other brands in green packaging.

Gain Original Ecobox HE, 96 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 fl oz

Gain Eco-Box is the same liquid laundry detergent you know but in smarter package. Made with 30% less water, it gives you 30% more freshness per drop* and lifts away dirt and locks in an ahhhmazing scent to keep your laundry smelling great, even after two weeks.

I dont typically use Gain, but I was excited to check out this new eco-box. The detergent itself has a really strong fragrance. It isnt bad but may not be able to be used with my normal softener. The box was wonderful! It was easy to store, easy to use, and good for the environment! Overall pleased. This review was collected as part of a promotion, but the thoughts and the opinions are my own. have order this before twice. decided to order it again. this time half my order arrived and the box itself was a mess the plastic packaging was nasty with soap. When removing the plastic wrap the box itself was torn and looked as if it leaked.

Tide Purclean Eco-box HE, 72 Loads Plant-based Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 Fl oz

Tide purclean removes stains and odors just as well as original Tide without harmful chemicals. This is great for anyone with sensitive skin or allergies. It leaves my laundry smelling fresh and removes stains. It is low sudsing and rinses easily. It dispenses easily from the carton and has a handy storage place for the cap in the top of the box. I love that the packaging has less plastic and more environment friendly. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The fragrance and packaging were great but my primary expectation from a laundry detergent is that it cleans my laundry. I was very disappointed with this product from a cleaning standpoint. I had to use an additive to get the same level of clean that I was used to from traditional Tide.

Tide Ecobox Original HE, 96 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 105 fl oz Tide Eco-Box is the same liquid laundry detergent you love in smarter package. Made with 30% less water, its re-engineered formula gives you 30% more cleaning power per drop than Tide Original liquid detergent in a 150 fl oz bottle, plus it's smaller and easier to store.   Great packaging. Easy to use. Would buy again. Soap works great but the box arrived in terrible shape. The soap is sealed in a cardboard box which arrived wet and totally destroyed. I was forced to transfer all the soap to an old Tide plastic container which wasn’t easy. Be careful if you have to do this the nozzle is a bit tricky. I spilled soap while transferring to the plastic container. Also for the price , I was expecting more fluid ounces. You’ll get more from plastic containers.

I have owned Witcher 3 on PC and have played it enough to understand the difference between the original game and the port for the switch. The game deserves to be ranked as both a port and for its content. Game: This is THE best rpg that has ever been written for a modern system. The quests feel real. Your decisions have weight and the voice acting is incredible. I love other rpgs (skyrim, divinity, final fantasy etc) but Witcher just manages to go miles above in many categories. The art of the game is downright immersive. The character models look like real people. The only downside is the combat is fairly tricky and can feel clunky sometimes. Port: First, the packaging is excellent for a switch game. My game came with a thank you letter, stickers, a little compendium and a map. If I am going to buy a 4 year old game at near full price, this is exactly what I want to come with the box. The second thing I noticed was that there is no day 1 patch. The whole game runs of the cart. This is great for someone without access to a fast internet connection and shows the time and care CDPR took in making this edition. Graphics have been downgraded from my PC version. Instead of a crisp dream, it reminds me of an impressionist painting. Absolutely playable but a change none-the-less. Framerate is good and colors pop. Sound is compressed but I didn't notice any large difference. Controls feel sharp. The biggest change is playing it on the go and how convenient that feels. I think that Saber Interactive absolutely hit the technicals out of the park when porting this. Bottom line: If you liked Breath of the Wild and own a switch, you need to buy, rent or find some way to get your hands on this game. This is by far the worst port on the Switch. This game is so flawed it is impossible to enjoy it. The graphics are ugly, has bad lighting effects and over saturated colors, there are pop-ins regularly (sometimes not even part of the scene, just random graphic glitches), stretching and distorted models when you cut of enemy's limbs - they will shake around and stretch out into infinity), NPCs and horses clipping thru the world, load screens and menus with no images - just a green screen, long load times, frame rate issues, unresponsive controls, clumsy mechanics, a mediocre story, poor voice acting, mini map gps and way points are useless, the horse is uncontrollable and the pathing is awful, and the menu is super slow (it takes 5.5 seconds to move something from your inventory to your storage [and vice versa] - I timed it multiple times). I can't believe that anyone would find this port acceptable in any way. It is highly advised that you stay away from this game. It is a complete waste of money.

If you like Mortal Kombat then you will love this game. It would have gotten a 5 star rating, but the load times are too long. Once you get going its a fun, action-packed fighting game. the justification for the poor graphics quality was to keep the game at a consistent 60fps. They failed to execute this on a good chunk of the actual game. The patches are delayed from other consoles. Constant crashes make it hard to enjoy for long periods. I've had the game crash each time I go into the Krypt (the game's unlocking feature for gear and items) and it crashes during gear swapping for character customization. It has also crashed on Towers resulting in a loss of consumable items used on the tower. The online works and that's it's only redeeming quality. But, again, it's rare that you get a consistent 60fps due to the background stuff going on in the different fight arenas.

Disney Classic Games: Aladdin and the Lion King - Nintendo Switch

Two of the most beloved Disney games of all time make their long-awaited return to modern consoles in Disney Classic Games: Aladdin and The Lion King This unforgettable package of Disney classics is filled with tons of new features, enhancements, game modes, and display options, plus multiple versions of the games Join Aladdin and his sidekick, Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Display Options and Updated Visuals: o 1080P graphics and enhancements for modern HD TVs Adjustable screen aspect ratios and borders Custom filter options designed to replicate classic CRT TVs and other popular screen types In-Game Rewind: Instantly rewind any of the games in real-time in order to retry difficult areas Interactive Game Viewer: View full game playthroughs, with the ability to skip forward, jump in, and start playing at any point Save Feature: Quickly save your progress in each of the games and continue your adventure wherever and whenever you want Museum Features: Take a journey behind-the-scenes and learn more about the creation of these incredible games. Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, Electronic Arts, Xbox One

A galaxy-spanning adventure awaits in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a new 3rd person action-adventure title from Respawn Entertainment. This narratively-driven single player game puts you in the role of a Jedi Padawan who narrowly escaped the purge of Order 66 following the events of Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith. On a quest to rebuild the Jedi Order, you must pick up the pieces of your shattered past to complete your training, develop new powerful Force abilities, and master the art of the iconic lightsaber all while staying one step ahead of the Empire and its deadly Inquisitors. While mastering your abilities, players will engage in cinematically-charged lightsaber and Force combat designed to deliver the kind of intense Star Wars lightsaber battles as seen in the films. Players will need to approach enemies strategically, sizing up strengths and weaknesses while cleverly utilizing your Jedi training to overcome your opponents and solve the mysteries that lay in your path. Star Wars fans will recognize iconic locations, weapons, gear, and enemies while also meeting a roster of fresh characters, locations, creatures, droids and adversaries new to Star Wars. As part of this authentic Star Wars story, fans will delve into a galaxy recently seized by the Empire. As a Jedi hero-turned fugitive, players will need to fight for survival while exploring the mysteries of a long-extinct civilization all in an effort to rebuild the remnants of the Jedi Order as the Empire seeks to erase the Jedi completely.

For ultimate bragging rights, connect via Autolog recommendations and compete with your friends and for the first time with potential rivals. Your leaderboard will populate with other players of similar skill level so you can see how you rank around the world. From insane heist missions to devastating car battles to jaw dropping set piece moments, Need for Speed Payback delivers an edge-of-your-seat, action-driving fantasy.

Experience rich and living Star Wars multiplayer battlegrounds across all three eras: prequel, classic, and new trilogy. Customize and upgrade your heroes, starfighters, or troopers, each with unique abilities to exploit in battle. Ride tauntauns or take control of tanks and speeders. Down Star Destroyers the size of cities, use the Force to prove your worth against iconic characters such as Kylo Ren, Darth Maul, or Han Solo, as you play a part in a gaming experience inspired by 40 years of timeless Star Wars films. You can become the master of your own Star Wars hero's journey. Love it, it is PERFECT! The packaging is excellent! Now, here are some things... this unit does not come with the riser to make it taller, you can buy the riser from the arcade 1up website. This unit was very easy and simple to put together - the instructions were very clear. Couple of things on that.... when it comes to the deck that the joystick sits on, there is a sticker that says to remove the film from BOTH sides - this means that clear plastic that goes on top of the deck. Yes there is film on both sides but it isnt obvious. If the cover is not completely crystal clear, then you left the film on one side. Also, the only difficulty I had was attaching the back cover, strangely enough. It was simple, but because of the screws it didnt want to go in. Use different (smaller) screws. And one last thing - when you first turn it on, it takes a minute before the screen goes on, so dont panic like I did lol.  This unit is NOT heavy so please do yourself a big favor and attach it to the wall with the provided hardware. I did not receive the Xbox game that was supposed to come with it.  The associate at the store told me it was still in transit which I found out was not the case.  The store manager was supposed to reach out to me about this but that never happened either.  On the bright side the online rep did do a good job of making things right.

ARK Survival Evolved, Studio Wildcard, Xbox One, 884095178185

Explore the Island: Solve the mystery of The ARK as you explore this massive island, discovering Explorer's Notebooks (filled with clues!) throughout. Make your way to the final boss and figure out why you've been dropped into this Jurassic-era experience.- Gather Resources, Customize Everything: An extensive crafting system invites you to mix and match materials scavenged from the island, while also modifying the colors, textures, shapes and style of everything from the walls of your home, to your character's armor, weapons and more.- Harvest, Hunt and Build: Cut down trees and turn them into a basic home, which you can quickly expand into a Jurassic estate. Hunt for meat, scavenge for plants (or start your own garden!)- Survive Above All: Hunger, thirst, basic safety and protecting yourself from the weather are all part of the game. Run too far and not only will you be exhausted, but you will also quickly get hungry and thirsty. Weather effects are based on real-world climates, and so you'll need to hide out from rain and snow, while making the most of sunny days.- Capture and Tame Dinosaurs: Discover over 100 different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures on the island, finding ways to tame them into useful additions for your tribe's dino herd.

I bought ARK when it first came out on PC roughly two years ago. It's been quite the adventure through all this time. Throughout this time, I've concluded that the concept of the game is amazing, along with the graphics, and most of the design. However, the development team aren't the sharpest tools in the shed. They're late on deadlines, they have a hard time fixing bugs, but they eventually get the job done. I have roughly 4,400 hours into the game in counting, and don't regret a single second of it. ARK is a great game, and I would recommend giving it a try. Odd, my highly detailed negative review is no longer here. This game is a huge time sink with developers who constantly take what people enjoy out of the game, don't communicate, never hit their deadlines, and ban people who speak out from their forums. Avoid it.

Need for Speed Payback, Electronic Arts, PlayStation 4, 014633735222

Need for Speed, one of the worlds bestselling video game franchises, returns with a vengeance in the new action-driving blockbuster Need for Speed Payback. Set in the underworld of Fortune Valley, you and your crew are reunited by a search for vengeance against The House, a nefarious cartel that rules the citys casinos, criminals, and cops. In this corrupt gamblers paradise, the stakes are high and The House always wins. Play a variety of challenges and events as Tyler, the Racer; Mac, the Showman; and Jess, the Wheelman. Each driver must take on races, missions, and challenges to earn the respect of the Valleys underground and compete in the ultimate race to finally take down The House. Your car is at the center of everything you do. Craft unique rides with deeper performance and visual customization than ever before. Push them to the limit when you narrowly escape the heat in epic police chases. Go head-to-head with other racers on or off-road through canyons, deserts, mountains, and the city. Raise the stakes by putting down additional in-game currency on events, challenges and missions to multiply your winnings, or risk losing it all. For ultimate bragging rights, connect via Autolog recommendations and compete with your friends and for the first time with potential rivals. Your leaderboard will populate with other players of similar skill level so you can see how you rank around the world. From insane heist missions to devastating car battles to jaw dropping set piece moments, Need for Speed Payback delivers an edge-of-your-seat, action-driving fantasy.

The Witcher III: Wild Hunt: Complete Edition, Warner Home, Nintendo Switch

A WHOLE WORLD TO EXPLORE. AT HOME AND ON THE GO. Winner of over 250 Game of the Year awards, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is a story-driven, open world adventure set in a dark fantasy universe. It's the perfect opportunity to enter this world for the first time or relive the adventure on the go

I have owned Witcher 3 on PC and have played it enough to understand the difference between the original game and the port for the switch. The game deserves to be ranked as both a port and for its content. Game: This is THE best rpg that has ever been written for a modern system. The quests feel real. Your decisions have weight and the voice acting is incredible. I love other rpgs (skyrim, divinity, final fantasy etc) but Witcher just manages to go miles above in many categories. The art of the game is downright immersive. The character models look like real people. The only downside is the combat is fairly tricky and can feel clunky sometimes. Port: First, the packaging is excellent for a switch game. My game came with a thank you letter, stickers, a little compendium and a map. If I am going to buy a 4 year old game at near full price, this is exactly what I want to come with the box. The second thing I noticed was that there is no day 1 patch. The whole game runs of the cart. This is great for someone without access to a fast internet connection and shows the time and care CDPR took in making this edition. Graphics have been downgraded from my PC version. Instead of a crisp dream, it reminds me of an impressionist painting. Absolutely playable but a change none-the-less. Framerate is good and colors pop. Sound is compressed but I didn't notice any large difference. Controls feel sharp. The biggest change is playing it on the go and how convenient that feels. I think that Saber Interactive absolutely hit the technicals out of the park when porting this. Bottom line: If you liked Breath of the Wild and own a switch, you need to buy, rent or find some way to get your hands on this game. This is by far the worst port on the Switch. This game is so flawed it is impossible to enjoy it. The graphics are ugly, has bad lighting effects and over saturated colors, there are pop-ins regularly (sometimes not even part of the scene, just random graphic glitches), stretching and distorted models when you cut of enemy's limbs - they will shake around and stretch out into infinity), NPCs and horses clipping thru the world, load screens and menus with no images - just a green screen, long load times, frame rate issues, unresponsive controls, clumsy mechanics, a mediocre story, poor voice acting, mini map gps and way points are useless, the horse is uncontrollable and the pathing is awful, and the menu is super slow (it takes 5.5 seconds to move something from your inventory to your storage [and vice versa] - I timed it multiple times). I can't believe that anyone would find this port acceptable in any way. It is highly advised that you stay away from this game. It is a complete waste of money.

If you like Mortal Kombat then you will love this game. It would have gotten a 5 star rating, but the load times are too long. Once you get going its a fun, action-packed fighting game. the justification for the poor graphics quality was to keep the game at a consistent 60fps. They failed to execute this on a good chunk of the actual game. The patches are delayed from other consoles. Constant crashes make it hard to enjoy for long periods. I've had the game crash each time I go into the Krypt (the game's unlocking feature for gear and items) and it crashes during gear swapping for character customization. It has also crashed on Towers resulting in a loss of consumable items used on the tower. The online works and that's it's only redeeming quality. But, again, it's rare that you get a consistent 60fps due to the background stuff going on in the different fight arenas.

Two of the most beloved Disney games of all time make their long-awaited return to modern consoles in Disney Classic Games: Aladdin and The Lion King This unforgettable package of Disney classics is filled with tons of new features, enhancements, game modes, and display options, plus multiple versions of the games Join Aladdin and his sidekick, Abu, as they race through the marketplace toward their date with destiny. Now, you too can be part of the adventure Driven into the wilderness by his evil uncle Scar, Simba finds salvation and Hakuna Matata with Pumbaa the warthog and Timon the meerkat. Tackle heinous hyenas in the elephants graveyard, avoid the trampling hooves of stampeding wildebeest as you battle through 10 levels to ensure Simba claims his rightful place as The Lion King. Multiple Game Versions: Play through several different versions of the beloved Aladdin and The Lion King games that have been created over the years, including both console and handheld versions. Display Options and Updated Visuals: o 1080P graphics and enhancements for modern HD TVs Adjustable screen aspect ratios and borders Custom filter options designed to replicate classic CRT TVs and other popular screen types In-Game Rewind: Instantly rewind any of the games in real-time in order to retry difficult areas Interactive Game Viewer: View full game playthroughs, with the ability to skip forward, jump in, and start playing at any point Save Feature: Quickly save your progress in each of the games and continue your adventure wherever and whenever you want Museum Features: Take a journey behind-the-scenes and learn more about the creation of these incredible games. Watch video interviews with the original development teams or explore numerous galleries containing hundreds of previously unreleased HD concept images and marketing assets.

Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, Electronic Arts, Xbox One

A galaxy-spanning adventure awaits in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a new 3rd person action-adventure title from Respawn Entertainment. This narratively-driven single player game puts you in the role of a Jedi Padawan who narrowly escaped the purge of Order 66 following the events of Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith. On a quest to rebuild the Jedi Order, you must pick up the pieces of your shattered past to complete your training, develop new powerful Force abilities, and master the art of the iconic lightsaber all while staying one step ahead of the Empire and its deadly Inquisitors. While mastering your abilities, players will engage in cinematically-charged lightsaber and Force combat designed to deliver the kind of intense Star Wars lightsaber battles as seen in the films. Players will need to approach enemies strategically, sizing up strengths and weaknesses while cleverly utilizing your Jedi training to overcome your opponents and solve the mysteries that lay in your path. Star Wars fans will recognize iconic locations, weapons, gear, and enemies while also meeting a roster of fresh characters, locations, creatures, droids and adversaries new to Star Wars. As part of this authentic Star Wars story, fans will delve into a galaxy recently seized by the Empire. As a Jedi hero-turned fugitive, players will need to fight for survival while exploring the mysteries of a long-extinct civilization all in an effort to rebuild the remnants of the Jedi Order as the Empire seeks to erase the Jedi completely.
